info.name: Reluv API
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for Reluv-App with all endpoints

request.description: Create a new category. Set parentId to null for top-level categories, or provide parentId to create a subcategory.
Get all top-level categories with nested child categories recursively. Returns Women, Men, Kids, Brands with their complete nested structure.
Get a single category by ID with nested child categories recursively, parent category, and associated products (limited to 10).
Update a category. All fields are optional. You can update name, slug, and/or parentId.
Delete a category. Cannot delete if category has child categories or associated products.

response.name: Success Response
Conflict - Has Children

request.description: Create a new product. Required fields: name, slug, description, categoryId, images (at least 1), variants (at least 1). Optional: parentCategoryId, childCategoryId, storeId, isPublished, isPreloved. If storeId is provided, user must own the store. Each variant requires: price, stock, condition, weight, length, width, height. Optional variant fields: size, color, compareAtPrice, conditionNote.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Vintage T-Shirt",
  "slug": "vintage-t-shirt-12345",
  "description": "Beautiful vintage t-shirt in excellent condition",
  "categoryId": 403,
  "parentCategoryId": 401,
  "childCategoryId": 404,
  "storeId": 1,
  "images": ["https://example.com/image1.jpg", "https://example.com/image2.jpg"],
  "isPublished": true,
  "isPreloved": true,
  "variants": [
    {
      "size": "M",
      "color": "Blue",
      "price": 150000,
      "compareAtPrice": 200000,
      "stock": 1,
      "condition": "NEW",
      "conditionNote": "Brand new with tags",
      "weight": 200,
      "length": 20,
      "width": 15,
      "height": 5
    }
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Updated Vintage T-Shirt",
  "slug": "updated-vintage-t-shirt-12345",
  "description": "Updated description for vintage t-shirt",
  "images": ["https://example.com/updated-image1.jpg"],
  "isPublished": true,
  "isPreloved": false,
  "categoryId": 403,
  "parentCategoryId": 401,
  "childCategoryId": 404
}

request.description: Add product to wishlist by productId (in URL path). No request body needed.
Create a voucher for a store. storeId is required and user must own the store. value is an integer (0-100 for PERCENTAGE, amount in Rupiah for FIXED_AMOUNT, 0 for FREE_SHIPPING).
Update a voucher. User must own the store that owns the voucher.
Delete a voucher. User must own the store that owns the voucher.
Get all discounts with optional filters. Scope can be GLOBAL, CATEGORY, PRODUCT, or STORE.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Store Discount 20%",
  "description": "Get 20% off on all store products",
  "type": "PERCENTAGE",
  "value": 20,
  "maxDiscount": 100000,
  "minPurchase": 200000,
  "scope": "STORE",
  "startDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "endDate": "2024-12-31T23:59:59.000Z",
  "usageLimit": 1000,
  "isActive": true,
  "storeId": 1
}

request.description: Create a store-specific discount. storeId is required. User must own the store. value is an integer (0-100 for PERCENTAGE, amount in Rupiah for FIXED_AMOUNT, 0 for FREE_SHIPPING).

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Category Discount 15%",
  "description": "Get 15% off on category products",
  "type": "PERCENTAGE",
  "value": 15,
  "maxDiscount": 50000,
  "minPurchase": 150000,
  "scope": "CATEGORY",
  "startDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "endDate": "2024-12-31T23:59:59.000Z",
  "usageLimit": 500,
  "isActive": true,
  "categoryId": 1
}

request.description: Create a category-specific discount. categoryId is required when scope is CATEGORY.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Product Discount 25%",
  "description": "Get 25% off on this product",
  "type": "PERCENTAGE",
  "value": 25,
  "maxDiscount": 75000,
  "minPurchase": 100000,
  "scope": "PRODUCT",
  "startDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "endDate": "2024-12-31T23:59:59.000Z",
  "usageLimit": 200,
  "isActive": true,
  "productId": 1
}

request.description: Create a product-specific discount. productId is required when scope is PRODUCT.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Global Sitewide Discount 5%",
  "description": "Get 5% off on all products",
  "type": "PERCENTAGE",
  "value": 5,
  "maxDiscount": 100000,
  "minPurchase": 500000,
  "scope": "GLOBAL",

request.description: Create a global sitewide discount. No storeId, categoryId, or productId needed for GLOBAL scope.
Update a discount. User must own the store if discount is store-specific.
Delete a discount. User must own the store if discount is store-specific.
Get all promotions with optional filters. Type can be FLASH_SALE, BOGO, BUNDLE, SEASONAL, or CUSTOM.
Create a promotion for a store. storeId is required and user must own the store. productIds is optional array of product IDs to link to the promotion.
Update a promotion. User must own the store.
Delete a promotion. User must own the store.

query.description: VERIFIED, PREMIUM, FEATURED, TRENDING, BEST_SELLER, NEW_STORE, CUSTOM

request.description: Get all badges with optional filters. Type can be VERIFIED, PREMIUM, FEATURED, TRENDING, BEST_SELLER, NEW_STORE, or CUSTOM.
Create a badge for a store. storeId is required and user must own the store.
Update a badge. User must own the store.
Delete a badge. User must own the store.
